Room.Name: Franchot Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: This is one of two tunnels that connects the great circular hallway to the main courtyard of Prince Rutger's Tower Castle.
Room.LongDescription: The old oak door here leads to the private apartment of one of the greatest paladins in the land, Commander Franchot. Franchot is a life-long friend of Prince Rutger, and supports Rutger in his battle with Prince Ragnar for the throne at Lyanden Castle in Oceancrest.
